body: I wasn't sure where to put this, so I stuck it here. This was a very broken walls match I was just in; instead of being in an arena, it teleported us to a random world which looked completely untouched. There were no walls but we were stuck in an invisible area until the prep time was finished. Here are a couple screenshots of it:
